statements: SELECT * FROM door_entry_logs;
SELECT entry_id, entry_timestamp, employee_id FROM door_entry_logs;
SELECT employee_id, entry_timestamp, door_id FROM door_entry_logs ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT entry_id, entry_type FROM door_entry_logs WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM door_entry_logs WHERE door_id = 5 AND entry_type = 'IN';
SELECT * FROM door_entry_logs WHERE entry_id = 1;
SELECT entry_id, employee_id, entry_timestamp FROM door_entry_logs WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT employee_id, entry_type FROM door_entry_logs WHERE entry_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM door_entry_logs WHERE entry_type = 'IN' GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT entry_id, employee_id FROM door_entry_logs WHERE door_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND entry_type = 'OUT' ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM door_entries;
SELECT entry_id, entry_time, entry_type FROM door_entries WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, position FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT entry_id, entry_time, entry_type FROM door_entries WHERE door_id = 3 AND entry_type = 'In' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM door_entries WHERE door_id = 1 ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE security_clearance = 'High';
SELECT entry_id, entry_type, employee_name FROM door_entries de INNER JOIN employee_details ed ON de.employee_id = ed.employee_id WHERE de.entry_type = 'Access' ORDER BY entry_id ASC;
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS total FROM employee_details GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(employee_id) > 1;
SELECT employee_name, position, security_clearance FROM employee_details WHERE department IN ('HR', 'IT') ORDER BY security_clearance DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM door_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT door_name, location FROM doors WHERE door_id = 5;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM door_events WHERE event_type = 'Access Granted';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM door_events WHERE door_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT door_name, location FROM doors WHERE location = 'Lobby';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT door_id, timestamp, event_type FROM door_events WHERE event_type = 'Access Granted';
SELECT event_id, timestamp FROM door_events WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE name='Alice';
SELECT log_id, entry_time, u.name as user_name, al.level_name FROM entry_logs el JOIN users u ON el.user_id=u.user_id JOIN access_levels al ON el.access_level_id=al.level_id;
SELECT entry_id, entry_time FROM door_entries WHERE entry_type='IN' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT u.name as user_name, al.level_name FROM entry_logs el JOIN users u ON el.user_id=u.user_id JOIN access_levels al ON el.access_level_id=al.level_id WHERE al.level_name='Admin';
SELECT * FROM door_entries WHERE entry_type = 'Entrance';
SELECT entry_id, entry_time, user_id FROM door_entries WHERE entry_type = 'Exit' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT u.name, e.entry_time, al.level_name FROM users u JOIN door_entries e ON u.user_id = e.user_id JOIN access_levels al ON al.level_id = e.access_level_id;
SELECT e.entry_id, u.name AS user_name, al.level_name AS access_level FROM door_entries e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN access_levels al ON e.access_level_id = al.level_id;
SELECT COUNT(*), date_trunc('day', entry_time) AS entry_day FROM door_entries GROUP BY entry_day ORDER BY entry_day ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT door_name, location FROM doors ORDER BY door_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position, department FROM employees JOIN doors ON employees.employee_id = doors.door_id;
SELECT entry_id, entry_type, entry_time FROM door_entries WHERE entry_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT entry_time, employee_id, door_id FROM door_entries WHERE entry_type = 'IN' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM entry_logs WHERE logged_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY logged_time ASC;

SELECT employee_name, door_name, access_level FROM employees JOIN access_levels ON employees.employee_id = access_levels.employee_id JOIN doors ON access_levels.door_id = doors.door_id WHERE access_level >= 3 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
